mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_NO /* prGoodsSafeCertiHis.getGoodsSafeCertiHistList */ , SAFE_CERTI_GB_CD , SAFE_CERTI_NO , SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,7,2) AS APLY_STR_DT , SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,7,2) AS APLY_END_DT , SAFE_CERTI_ORN_NM , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_SAFE_CERTI_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo}
